item.title: You can now access Fashion Television as a standalone satellite channel in Asia
item.description:
Source: Fashion Television website. Asian fashion enthusiasts can now enjoy Fashion Television as a dedicated satellite channel. While Fashion Television has been offering fashion programming to Asian viewers as part of other content blocks since 1999, this dedicated channel allows over a billion people access to its content 24/7. Fashion Television International, based in London, opted to utilize the Asiasat 7 satellite, operated by Hong Kong’s Asiasat Satellite Telecommunications Co...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/you-can-now-access-fashion-television-as-a-standalone-satellite-channel-in-asia/

item.title: The Warrior Forum has introduced a new e-marketplace that leverages the existing reach of its members
item.description:
Warrior Forum, a prominent online community and marketplace for internet marketers, has introduced Warrior Payments. This comprehensive platform aims to revolutionize online sales by combining payments, analytics, affiliate marketing, and distribution tools. Matt Barrie, CEO of Freelancer.com, which acquired Warrior Forum in 2014, highlights the platform’s value for entrepreneurs and startups looking to launch and sell products or services online. Warrior Payments streamlines the sales process by integrating payment processing, digital product delivery, analytics, affiliate marketing, and distribution...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-warrior-forum-has-introduced-a-new-e-marketplace-that-leverages-the-existing-reach-of-its-members/
